column7: Offers an advanced graduate survey of research in areas related to research in research methods, across a wide range of topics. Designed to incorporate multiple guest lectures. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in the same or separate terms, to a maximum of 16 hours, if topics vary.
